response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to enhance your daily experiences. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than $80 to you. To ensure you have the opportunity to experience its value, I am offering it to you for $120. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the time and effort we've invested into creating something truly special. I trust that you'll find the product invaluable and worth every penny. Looking forward to your positive response!", "product_price": 120}
